comment: Using it alongside my Bluetooth speaker, and it's great. Only complaint so far is that reordering songs under "Now Playing" playlist doesn't seem to work quite right. Might be because my library is huge or that I'm using the free version. Really considering the paid, full version of this app regardless of what's causing it. 😃
title: Loving it!

author: Akiteck Ng
comment: Unable to read Imported playlists. Playlist viewer will not work if playlist is imported even with pls, wpl, m3u or m3u8 format. Adding playlist to playlist editor wont be able to play song too. Dang. 100+ of my playlists weren't working. Solution can be made by deselecting use orignal playlist instead of a winamp managed copy.
title: Almost perfect but one big mistake

comment: If you got Winamp  and are lookng for a remote you can't do better than this! Does everything you need, and is clean and faultless. I'm gonna buy it!

author: Kyle Storm
comment: Clearly a lot of effort was put into this. This is a very feature-packed Winamp remote control with a good looking and functional interface (especially the dark one). On the server/plugin side, the encryption, and the ability to actually remotely turn Winamp on is a major plus. Wish I could select which interface to listen on, but Windows Firewall works for now. Great job, guys!
title: Very well done

author: Anugrah Rinto Pratama
comment: Cant edit or delete playlist in free mode. so once a playlist is saved, its there, even if you delete cache and data and uninstall. will give 5 stars if these features is added.

author: Jonny Negation
comment: Used to work fine, but now the server "is not a valid win32 app".  None of the older versions work either.

author: A Geer
comment: Installs well and works like a champ. I would highly recommend this app. I've been looking for a controller for my pc based winamp program for months. I love it so much I'm upgrading to pro. Nice work you guys.
title: Wow

author: Charles Pope
comment: After setting up the free version, I've never bought an app so quickly. It works amazingly!

author: George Kalliakoudas
comment: Doesn't work with windows 10. Used to be the best
title: Stopped working

author: Sylviana Pricilla
comment: I don't understand about the server :|

reply.author: Georg Baumgarten
reply.content: Hi. You have to download and install the server on your computer to get the connection up and running. You only can control Winamp remotely when you install the server and setup the connection in the app.

comment: Doesn't work with Windows XP.
title: Won't work.

author: Clint C
comment: Works seamlessly and tons of features. Great work Devs.
title: Love it!

comment: this item is not available in your country. country is thailand. please help
title: need buy pro but

author: Daisy Mejia
comment: Well made and easy to use
title: Essential tool for Winamp users!

author: Jaguar Bar
comment: Love it even  can't  buy pro version  in Thailand.

author: Trevor Jenke
comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Achieves everything I needed it to.
title: Brilliant

author: mark danson
comment: Great app no problems
title: Great

author: A Google User
comment: The best remote yet.

reply.author: Georg Baumgarten
reply.content: Hello, this popup is just for information purposes. Does it cause any problems in your case? Please contact the support at www.geb-dev.com, so we can fix this problem. Thank you.

author: A Google User
comment: wonderful!!

Knocked off 1 star for the back button at the top of the "About" page not working, and 1 star for the price of the paid version. $4 is a bit much considering other Winamp remotes are free & other player remotes like the official one for Aimp are also free.
title: Could be 5 stars...

author: Joey Nelson
comment: Only complaint is the "Blablibbub" on the widget where "song name" and "artist" should be. It looks unprofessional. Otherwise this is the greatest thing for me. I stream my controls to my computer to change the music as I read a book or play a game on my tablet. The notification bar controls are super convenient, although I'd definitely use a volume slider there if there was one. The remote starting, visualizor opening, EQ-enabling settings get a lot of use, and are much appreciated :)

reply.author: Georg Baumgarten
reply.content: Thanks for the hint, I will remove this with the next update :)

title: Most used convenience app.

author: Alexandru Turcan
comment: Misto aplicatia. Nu se blocheaza sau alte probleme de genul. Smecherie :x
title: Vodafone V860  Smart II/Galaxy I9300/Galaxy I9505

author: Mike Lumb
comment: Doesn't list any of my music.
title: Doesn't work for me..

author: Anthony Chong
comment: Will this app be skinnable in future? I would like to make my transport buttons sizable. Thanks

reply.author: Georg Baumgarten
reply.content: Hello. Sorry, but the app won't be skinnable in the future due to lack of time.

title: Skinnable?

author: Nikhil Rastogi
comment: Just what I was looking for. It's great.
title: Wonderful Winamp Remote Control

author: JEYABALAN K
comment: Ok

author: Devin Walsh
comment: This app functioned smoothly, but wouldn't load over half of my collection. My favourite bands and albums couldn't be listened to using this app. Very dissapointed.

reply.author: Georg Baumgarten
reply.content: Hello. The free version of the only syncs up to 1000 songs as a demonstration purpose of what the Pro version is capable of. You will be able to sync your entire library after buying the pro version.

title: Missing a lot of albums

author: Alex Mwenja
comment: No more having to sit through a song I don't like just because I'm feeling too lazy to walk to the pc. You guys are the best!!!!!
title: Great App!!!!!

author: Jenia Nio
comment: This app is great but the only thing is missing is the "Jump" feature from the free and the paid app . Except this one thing , this is a great app !
title: The Jump feature is missing .

author: Mathieu A
comment: Every update features that were previously available for free become payable such as the sleep function...cheap

author: ShiguMiku They
comment: This app make me no need walk to pc while sleep on the bed :3
title: Awesome!

author: Timothy Petersen
comment: This app does not work, it is a waste of time, do not bother trying to use it, yeah 200,00 users? anyone can claim that

reply.author: Georg Baumgarten
reply.content: Hello. Sorry that you are not satisfied with this app. However, before posting a negative comment, please contact the support at contact@geb-dev.com. Maybe we can fix the issue you have... initial setup and connection problems are often caused by firewalls. I'm looking forward to hear from you and really want to help you.

comment: Nice cool

author: Simon Chan
comment: But there's one small problem, For some reason, not all of my songs sync up. Any help on getting this to fully sync my library would be greatly appreciated. Wouldn't mind buying the Pro version if it did.

reply.author: Georg Baumgarten
reply.content: Hello, free version is limited to 500 songs. With Pro, all songs will be snyced.
